forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds ESE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
